name: Tear the damn tree down
description:
Beware of the evil lumberjacks who want to tear the damn tree down to expand their city and build new houses. Defend your holy tree and save the last green space!

Download our first game jam game ever.

Made for LudumDare46

Controls:

Move: WSAD

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Plant: F

Special Attack: Hold Space (costs 80 Blood)

Grenade: E (costs 10 corn)

Sprint: Shift

Map: Tab

Try to defend the Tree and yourself and defeat all incoming waves.
